sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-layout>
    <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" class="py-2" permanent>
      <v-list class="text-start" :lines="false" nav>
        <v-list-subheader>PAGES</v-list-subheader>
        <v-list-item
          v-for="item in navigationDrawerItems"
          :key="item.url"
          :title="item.title"
          :to="item.url"
          color="primary"
        >
          <template v-slot:prepend>
            <v-icon :icon="item.icon"></v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-list-subheader>THEME</v-list-subheader>
        <v-radio-group v-model="darkMode" @click="changeTheme">
          <v-radio :value="false" label="Light" color="yellow"></v-radio>
          <v-radio :value="true" label="Dark" color="info"></v-radio>
        </v-radio-group>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>
  </v-layout>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";

export default {
  name: "NavigationComponent",
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: true,
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: false,
      navigationDrawerItems: [
        { title: "Home", url: "/", icon: "mdi-home-outline" },
        { title: "Settings", url: "settings", icon: "mdi-cog-outline" },
        { title: "Register", url: "register", icon: "mdi-account-plus" },
        { title: "Login", url: "login", icon: "mdi-login" },
        { title: "About", url: "about", icon: "mdi-information-outline" },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openNavbar() {
      this.drawer = !this.drawer;
    },
    changeTheme() {
      this.darkMode = !this.darkMode;
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkMode" : "lightMode";
    },
  },
  computed: {
    myDrawer() {
      return this.drawer;
    },
    windowWidth() {
      return this.$vuetify.display.width;
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style></style>
